author: COMSOL
description: This example calculates the spectral properties of an optical ring resonator. The model demonstrates how to use the Field Continuity boundary condition at boundaries, where there is a jump in the predefined phase approximation.
label: optical_ring_resonator.mph
name: root

settings.value:
